name: Memoria (itch) (fNathan)
description:
Memoria is a short kinetic novel. It follows our protagonist William as he struggles against his depression. Follow his journey to overcome his depression and once again take another step forward.

Memoria will take you about 15 to 20 minutes to finish and was made in roughly three and a half weeks for the NaNoRenO 2022. It is our first try on making a Visual Novel. We hope you will enjoy it.

As this is our first time,  we are still learning how to write a story.

We hope to hear what you think of our game, be it bad or good. So that we can continue to learn and be better.

Our thanks, Team Wombat.
